Form Elements

Cross browser normalized responsive forms with minimal styling to allow easy overrides and lean CSS.

All inputs are responsive with progressively enhanced fallbacks for unsupported types. A hook class .no-edit can be used to mimic non-editable inputs, and all fields can be made to display inline by adding the class .inline-block or stretch to full width by adding the class .full-width.

Smaller elements such as radio and checkbox inputs can be aligned by wrapping them in a div with the class .input-group.

Standard Layout

Standard Form

Support text to help describe the input.

No edit

Horizontal Layout

Add class .form-horizontal to the form.

Standard Form

Support text to help describe the input.

No edit
